::SnowCat::
SHe chuckled at Ramulus, "I've never know a shuttle ride to give 
anyone a spark attack, but if you came that close to one, I'll make 
not to book a flight."

She looked at the two bots. "Yes, all help will be greatly 
appreciated."

She hoped that they would be strong enough to stay off another 
attack. But then, her mind went back to the two bots who were taken.

She then thought of Iris. She walked inside the entrance of the ship.
"Iris? Did you happen to track the enemy bots who took Striker and 
Spears?  Did you happen to find out where they went with our two 
friends?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> No, I meant Alloran2's two chars. Ramulus is the one speaking with 
Astrol and 
> Fenox.
> 
> ::Shredder/Ramulus::
> 
> Shredder shakes his head, glancing at Mantella. "We don't really 
have a 
> functional base. I don't think a mission would be all that great."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramulus shakes his head, chuckling at SnowCat. "I'm not going back 
there any 
> time soon! I'm even gonna stop jumping for a bit!"
> 
> He looks back at the Ark, hearing IRIS's responce. "There was a 
battle a 
> short time ago," he says, "Do you have scans for any unusual 
weapons that 
> were used in it? Namely mind controll devices, probably chips?"
> 
> He looks up as the two bots, Astrol and Fenox, fly up, sighing in 
both relief 
> and annoyance. New troops were always welcome, but interruptions....
> 
> "Yes, a temporary truce will be good," he replies over his 
comm, "We might 
> need some help soon. Are your troops willing to fight?"
